file_insights.changes_summary: Comprehensive responsive design refinements for mobile-first approach
key_modifications: Responsive padding: Changed fixed padding to responsive values (px: { xs: 2, sm: 3 }, py: { xs: 2, sm: 2.5 })
Responsive bottom padding: pb adjusted for mobile (xs: 10) and tablet (sm: 12)
Typography scaling: Added responsive font sizes for headings (h5: { xs: '1.5rem', sm: '1.75rem' })
Button styling: Increased button heights (py: 1.75, minHeight: 56), added fontWeight: 600
Icon sizing: Standardized icon sizes (fontSize: 20 for action buttons, 18 for info icons)
Layout alignment: Changed alignItems from 'center' to 'flex-start' for better mobile spacing
Text wrapping: Implemented WebkitLineClamp: 2 for location text to prevent overflow
Chip styling: Added px: 1 and adjusted label padding for better touch targets
Skeleton heights: Updated heights (36, 56, 130px) to match component dimensions
Empty state: Added textAlign: 'center' and color to icon for consistency
file_insights.impact: Improves mobile UX with better spacing, touch targets, and text handling across screen sizes

patterns_discovered.description: Used MUI sx prop with responsive breakpoints { xs: mobile, sm: tablet } instead of fixed values
patterns_discovered.benefit: Enables precise control over spacing and sizing across mobile-first breakpoints

patterns_discovered.description: Buttons and interactive elements sized with minHeight: 56px to meet mobile accessibility standards (56px = ~8mm minimum touch target)
patterns_discovered.benefit: Improves mobile usability and accessibility compliance

patterns_discovered.description: Multi-line text clipping for location/stage information using WebkitLineClamp
examples: Removed whiteSpace: 'nowrap' in favor of line clamping
patterns_discovered.benefit: Prevents text overflow on mobile while maintaining readability

patterns_discovered.description: Standardized icon sizing and alignment with flexShrink: 0 for location icon
patterns_discovered.benefit: Creates visual consistency and prevents icon scaling issues

patterns_discovered.description: Added clarifying comments for skeleton loading sections

gotchas_discovered.description: Icons in different locations need different sizes - action buttons use fontSize: 20 while info icons use fontSize: 18. Not standardizing these causes visual inconsistency.
gotchas_discovered.solution_applied: Explicitly set fontSize in icon sx props rather than relying on variant defaults

gotchas_discovered.description: Long location/stage names on mobile can overflow single-line text containers. Fixed width containers force truncation.
gotchas_discovered.solution_applied: Switched to WebkitLineClamp: 2 with WebkitBoxOrient: 'vertical' for multi-line display

gotchas_discovered.description: When location text wraps to multiple lines, vertically centering the icon doesn't align properly. Need flex-start alignment.
gotchas_discovered.solution_applied: Changed alignItems from 'center' to 'flex-start' and added mt: 0.25, flexShrink: 0 to icon

gotchas_discovered.description: Buttons with py: 1.5 don't meet 56px minimum touch target recommendation, causing potential mobile accessibility issues.
gotchas_discovered.solution_applied: Increased py to 1.75 and added minHeight: 56 to all action buttons

gotchas_discovered.description: Default Chip component doesn't provide adequate padding for the label, making text feel cramped on mobile.
gotchas_discovered.solution_applied: Added explicit px: 1 to Chip root and px: '6px' to MuiChip-label

gotchas_discovered.description: Skeleton loading placeholders had different heights (60px, 120px) than actual rendered buttons (56px, 130px), creating layout shift.
gotchas_discovered.solution_applied: Updated skeleton heights to match actual component dimensions

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully implemented mobile-first responsive design refinements matching mockup specifications
key_achievements: Implemented responsive padding strategy with breakpoint-specific values
Standardized touch target sizes across all interactive elements
Fixed text overflow issues with intelligent line clamping
Achieved consistent icon sizing and alignment
Enhanced overall mobile UX with proper spacing and visual hierarchy
approach_outcome.testing_approach: Visual regression testing against mockup at mobile (xs) and tablet (sm) breakpoints
approach_outcome.completeness: All responsive design elements aligned with mockup specifications

recommendations.rationale: Multiple instances of { xs: 2, sm: 3 } pattern suggests opportunity for constant definitions or custom theme spacing

recommendations.recommendation: Document mobile breakpoint strategy in component documentation
recommendations.rationale: Touch target sizing (56px) and responsive values follow accessibility standards but need team awareness

recommendations.recommendation: Consider using CSS media queries for complex responsive layouts
recommendations.rationale: For highly complex responsive behavior, native CSS might be more performant than object-based sx props
recommendations.condition: If component becomes more complex with additional breakpoints

recommendations.rationale: Different icon sizes (16, 18, 20, 48) across components suggests need for size system

recommendations.recommendation: Add visual regression tests for responsive breakpoints
recommendations.rationale: Current approach relies on manual verification; automated testing would catch future regressions
recommendations.tools: Percy, Playwright visual testing, or similar

recommendations.recommendation: Update component prop documentation with responsive value examples
recommendations.rationale: Developers need clear examples of how to use responsive sx values for future components
